articles.author: Nanette Asimov
articles.title: How Stanford’s vaccine algorithm caused a major controversy and left frontline workers at the back of the line - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: After Stanford doctors staged a loud protest, the university abandoned an algorithm that was supposed to prioritize which staffers get the coronavirus vaccine first. Here’s what happened next.
articles.content: To choose who would be first in line for a coronavirus vaccine, UCSF Medical Center in San Francisco gathered a group of brainy people this fall to study guidelines and prioritize employees who came … [+8889 chars]
